timeline.bodyText: please add a link to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cosmos-db/conflict-resolution-policies here.
timeline.author: moderakh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -15,49 +14,49 @@
 
 /**
  * Represents the conflict resolution policy configuration for specifying how to resolve conflicts
- * in case writes from different regions result in conflicts on documents in the collection in the Azure Cosmos DB
+ * in case writes from different regions result in conflicts on items in the container in the Azure Cosmos DB

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/sdk/cosmos/azure-cosmos/src/main/java/com/azure/cosmos/models/ConflictResolutionPolicy.java b/sdk/cosmos/azure-cosmos/src/main/java/com/azure/cosmos/models/ConflictResolutionPolicy.java index 1d754f9da44..108fc2814d4 100644 --- a/sdk/cosmos/azure-cosmos/src/main/java/com/azure/cosmos/models/ConflictResolutionPolicy.java +++ b/sdk/cosmos/azure-cosmos/src/main/java/com/azure/cosmos/models/ConflictResolutionPolicy.java @@ -16,6 +16,9 @@ import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode; * Represents the conflict resolution policy configuration for specifying how to resolve conflicts * in case writes from different regions result in conflicts on items in the container in the Azure Cosmos DB * service. + * + * Refer to: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cosmos-db/conflict-resolution-policies + * *

* A container with custom conflict resolution with no user-registered stored procedure. * 

{@code
